articles.title: JK Rowling hate law posts not criminal, police say - BBC.com
articles.description: Social media comments by JK Rowling challenging Scotland's new hate crime law are not being treated as criminal.

articles.author: James Rogerson
articles.title: Apple reportedly won't bring iPadOS 18 to three iPads, but there's better news for iPhones - TechRadar
articles.content: If you’ve been holding onto an older iPad then this might be the year to upgrade, as not only are we expecting to see the iPad Pro 2024, the iPad Air 6, the iPad 11, and the iPad mini 7, but Apple ap… [+2141 chars]

articles.title: Study aims to break link between brain injury and depression - BBC.com
articles.description: Half of those admitted to hospital with a brain injury report depression in the following year, research suggests.
